Retrieves the acyclic data or service parameter of the MBN node.

Retrieves process data from the main bus node (MBN).

Sets the service parameter of the main bus node (MBN).

Parameters

Returns
: RET_OK on success , RET_ERROR on failure

getMBNProcessData() getMBNProcessDataMainBusNode.c MainBusNode.cgetMBNProcessData
uint8_t getMBNProcessData (uint8_t * data)
Retrieves process data from the main bus node (MBN).
Parameters
outdata
Pointer to a variable where the retrieved process data will be stored.
Returns
uint8_t Returns RET_OK on success, or RET_ERROR on failure. Refer to e_error_code for possible error codes.

getMBNServiceParam() getMBNServiceParamMainBusNode.c MainBusNode.cgetMBNServiceParam
uint8_t getMBNServiceParam (uint8_t parameter_name, void * data)
Retrieves the acyclic data or service parameter of the MBN node.
Parameters
inparameter_name
The enumerated parameter name to retrieve. Refer to e_mbn_service_parameter_name for valid MBN parameters.
outdata
Pointer to the buffer where the retrieved parameter value will be stored.
Returns
Returns 0 on success, or an error code on failure. Refer to error_code_t for possible error codes.
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

setMainBusIpAddress() setMainBusIpAddressMainBusNode.c MainBusNode.csetMainBusIpAddress
uint8_t setMainBusIpAddress (uint16_t parameter_name, uint32_t * ipaddress_value)
Retrieves the pin value of the main bus.
Returns
The 32-bit pin value of the main bus.
Sets the IP address for the specified port on the main bus.
Parameters
inparameter_name
The enumerated parameter name specifying the port for which the IP address is to be set. Refer to e_mainbus_parameter_name for valid parameters.
inipaddress_value
The 32-bit IP address value to be assigned.
Returns
Returns 0 on success, or an error code on failure. Refer to error_code_t for possible error codes.
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:
setMBNServiceParam() setMBNServiceParamMainBusNode.c MainBusNode.csetMBNServiceParam
uint8_t setMBNServiceParam (uint8_t parameter_name, void * data)
Sets the service parameter of the main bus node (MBN).
This function sets a specific service parameter for the main bus node using the provided parameter name and data.
Parameters
inparameter_name
